USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_102: First name must be greater than or equal to 3 characters and less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_103: Middle name must be less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_105: Last name must be greater than or equal to 3 characters and less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_108: Email must be greater than or equal to 7 characters and less than or equal to 50 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_110: Password must be greater than or equal to 8 characters and less than or equal to 50 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_111: Password must include atleast one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and a special character
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_115: LoginId must be greater than or equal to 5 characters and less than or equal to 50 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_116: Passcode must be equal to 8 digits
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_117: First name must be greater than or equal to 3 characters and less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_118: Mobile must be less than or equal to 12 digits
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_119: AddressNo must be less than or equal to 5 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_120: AddressSuffix must be less than or equal to 2 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_121: AddressLine1 must be less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_122: AddressLine2 must be less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_123: Region must be less than or equal to 20 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_124: CountryCode must be equal to 2 or 3 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_128: User ID must be exactly 8 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_130: Token must be less than or equal to 200 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_131: AddressLine3 must be less than or equal to 25 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.U_132: Zip Code must be less than or equal to 10 characters
USER-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.400: Combination of Zip code and House number does not exist

LOGIN-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.L_203: User account unverified or reset password
LOGIN-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.L_205: Account is locked for next 30 minutes. Retry after unlocking.

ALERT-ENQUIRY-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.AS_106: Alert type must be less than or equal to 20 characters
ALERT-ENQUIRY-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.AS_109: Alert content must be less than or equal to 200 characters
ALERT-ENQUIRY-SERVICE-ERROR-CODES.AS_110: Source of Alert type must be less than or equal to 20 characters
